navbar.not_live: This website is not yet live. This is just a test system

mint.title: Borrow
mint.no_positions: There are no other positions yet.
mint.liquidation_price_too_high: Your liquidation price is too high! Change the liquidation price or the amount received.
mint.expiration_date_description: The position must either be repaid or extended before the expiry date. Extensions can be found under "My Positions".
mint.your_liquidation_price_is_too_high: Your liquidation price is too high!
mint.expected_interest: Expected interest for the selected period
mint.discuss_recommendation: It is recommended to <0>discuss</0> new positions before initiating them to increase the probability of passing the decentralized governance process.
mint.while_the_maturity_is_fixed: While the maturity is fixed, you can adjust the liquidation price and the collateral amount later as long as it covers the minted amount. No interest will be refunded when repaying earlier.

error.token_decimals_should_be_less_than_24: Token decimals should be less than 24.
error.must_be_at_least_the_minimum_amount: Must be at least the minimum amount.
error.annual_interest_rate_exceeded: Annual Interest Rate should be less than {{rate}}%
error.initialization_period_too_short: Initialization period should be at least {{days}} days.
error.liquidation_value_too_low: The liquidation value of the collateral must be at least {{amount}} {{symbol}}
error.collateral_value_too_low: The collateral must be worth at least {{amount}} {{symbol}}
error.duration_too_short: Duration should be at least {{hours}} hours.
error.expiration_date_out_of_range: Expiration Date should be between Now and Limit

my_positions.no_challenges: You do not have any challenges yet.
my_positions.no_bids: You do not have any bids yet.
my_positions.not_enough_collateral: Not enough collateral for the given price and mint amount.
my_positions.is_in_cooldown: This position is in cooldown, please wait
my_positions.can_mint_at_most: Can mint at most {{amount}} {{symbol}} given price and collateral.
my_positions.only_after_cooldown: The amount can only be increased after the new price has gone through cooldown.
my_positions.only_adjust_your_own_position: You can only adjust your own position
my_positions.to_be_added_from_your_wallet: To be added from your wallet
my_positions.added_to_reserve_on_your_behalf: Added to reserve on your behalf

monitoring.title: Monitoring
monitoring.cooldown_message: This position is subject to a cooldown period that ends on {{formatDate}} as its owner has recently increased the applicable liquidation price. The cooldown period gives other users an opportunity to challenge the position before additional dEuros can be minted.
monitoring.challenge_description_how_it_works: A challenge is divided into two phases:
monitoring.challenge_description_how_it_works_phase: During the fixed price phase, anyone can buy the {{symbol}} you provided at the liquidation price of {{price}} {{symbol}} each.

If there are any {{symbol}} left after the fixed price phase ends, you get the remaining {{symbol}} back and the price starts to decline towards zero. In this phase, the bidders are not buying from the challenger any more, but from the position owner. You will get 2% of the sales proceeds as a reward.

error.not_enough_collateral: Not enough {{symbol}} in your wallet to cover the expected costs.
error.expected_buying_collateral: Expected buying collateral should be lower than remaining collateral.
error.amount_cannot_be_larger_than_position: Amount cannot be larger than the underlying position
error.amount_must_be_at_least_the_minimum: Amount must be at least the minimum

error.not_enough_deuro: Not enough {{symbol}} in your wallet to cover the expected costs.
error.expected_winning_collateral: Expected winning collateral should be lower than remaining collateral.

governance.title: Governance
governance.base_rate_description: This is the base rate that is applied when minting new {{symbol}} and the rate at which savers continuously accrue interest. Anyone with veto power can propose a change, which can be applied if there is no counter-proposal within seven days.
governance.new_positions_description: Participants should carefully review newly proposed position types and deny them if they think they pose a risk to the stability of the dEURO. There is also a <0>github forum</0> and a <1>telegram group</1> to discuss eligible collaterals and their parameters.
governance.positions_table_empty: If there are new positions with new parameters or a new type of collateral, they are shown here until they have passed the governance process.
governance.d_euro_api_bot_description: The dEURO API Bot is a Telegram communication tool designed to keep users informed about various activities and updates within the dEURO ecosystem.
governance.d_euro_api_bot_description_2: Users can subscribe to different types of updates using specific handles.

referrals.title: Referrals
referrals.set_up_your_unique_referral_link: Set up your unique referral link
referrals.invite_friends: Invite your friends so that they can benefit from the dEURO system too.
referrals.your_friend_joins_description: When your friend follows the link and connects their wallet, you will be registered as their referrer.
referrals.get_reward_description: You receive 1% of the revenues and fees they generate. The rewards are paid out in dEURO.
referrals.earn_1_on_investments_loans_and_savings: Earn 1% on investments, loans and savings!
referrals.no_referrals_yet: You do not have any referrals yet.
referrals.no_bonus_history_yet: You do not have any bonus history yet.
referrals.who_is_entitled_to_participate_in_the_re: Who is entitled to participate in the referral system?
Everyone who has interacted with the dEuro Protocol once is authorized and receives their referral code.
referrals.is_there_a_limit_to_how_many_referrals_i: Is there a limit to how many referrals I can earn bonus for?
No, there are no limits to how many referrals you can do.
referrals.how_do_i_join_the_referral_program: How do I join the referral program?
referrals.how_do_i_join_the_referral_program_answe: Every user who accesses the dEURO Protocol for the first time via your referral link counts as one of your referred users. The number of successful referrals depends on the number of recommended accounts via your referral link with an initial invest in the dEURO Protocol.
referrals.how_and_how_often_will_i_be_paid: How and how often will I be paid?
referrals.how_and_how_often_will_i_be_paid_answer: The Protocol automatically pays out for your referred customers in dEURO.
referrals.the_savings_module_pro_rata_daily_payout: the Savings module - pro rata, daily payout
referrals.in_addition_there_are_sign_up_bonuses_wh: In addition, there are sign-up bonuses which are paid out directly as soon as the referrer invests in the Saving, Equity or Borrow module of the dEURO protocol for the first time.
referrals.your_referral_bonus_can_be_claimed_by_yo: Your referral bonus can be claimed by you at any time.
referrals.how_do_i_receive_my_referral_bonus: How do I receive my referral bonus?
referrals.how_do_i_receive_my_referral_bonus_answe: Your bonuses paid out by the system are collected and are available to you at any time. To do this, you must actively claim the bonus.
referrals.if_my_friend_forgets_to_use_the_referral: If my friend forgets to use the referral link or code, can I still receive the bonus?
Regrettably, without the use of a referral code or link, we are unable to add any referral bonus to your account.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.take_loans_description: Borrow dEURO at competitive rates by using Bitcoin, Ethereum, or other cryptocurrencies as collateral — unlock liquidity while keeping your assets!
dashboard.earn_interest_description: Earn secure, hassle-free returns by depositing your dEURO into the Savings module — let your money work for you!
dashboard.benefit_from_protocol_description: dEURO Protocol Shares (nDEPS & DEPS) grant governance power, fee earnings, and liquidation profits — along with residual risk. Holders drive growth and stability. Governance is veto-based: 2% voting power can block proposals.
dashboard.governance_description: Here you have the opportunity to participate in the governance of the dEURO protocol by monitoring new positions, the base rate or other system-relevant parameters. Activate the expert mode to gain insight.
dashboard.governance_description_2: Participants should carefully review newly proposed position types and deny them if they think they pose a risk to the stability of dEURO. There also is a <0>github forum</0> to discuss eligible collaterals and their parameters.
dashboard.dEURO_Protocol_Share_Holders_nDEPS_and_D: dEURO Protocol Share Holders (nDEPS and DEPS)
dashboard.no_borrowings_yet: You do not have any loans yet.
dashboard.no_investments_yet: You do not have any investments yet.
dashboard.no_savings_yet: You do not have any savings yet.
